author: Travis Fedschun
title: South Koreans breaking quarantine rules to be strapped with electronic tracking wristbands
description: If you don't stay at home, get ready to get tracked.
content:
Get all the latest news on coronavirus and more delivered daily to your inbox. Sign up here.
People in South Korea who don't stay home are going to be tracked.
